'''''Theater Fire Drill''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series IX]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must break the shield of the [["Statue of Marble and Brass"]] as it performs its "Fulgent Fortissimo" attack.
